About

G'day, I am Gerard, a university student taking up BS Computer Science

I started programming back when I was in High School, 9th Grade. I was introduced to programming during my computer subject and was immediately hooked by the thought of being able to make anything with computers.

I started my Web Development Journey last year, 2022, and have been continuing to learn more about Web Development.

I also started to dip my toes into other technologies and fields outside of Web Development such as Linux, Rust, C/C++, and Java.
